titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that the mandatory separation age for Federal firefighters be made the same as the age that applies with respect to Federal law enforcement officers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight. Commerce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 11/16/1995--Introduced. Amends Federal civil service law relating to the Civil Service Retirement System and the Federal Employees' Retirement System to change the mandatory separation age for Federal fire fighters from 55 to 57 (the same as that for Federal law enforcement officers).
